title: I play champs based upon their lore, not their abilities
body: Does anybody else do this, or something else weird when picking champions XD? i just love the idea of playing a "hero" type character, xin zhao probably being my favourite of all.

replies.body:
I've tried picking up champions before based on how cool their lore was. But in the end what always keeps me coming back to champions are cool in game mechanics. 

I love playing champions with low cool downs and skill shots. Right now Ahri, Yasuo, Zed are probably my favourite.
A voice a appears in Riot Marauder's head. It slowly whispers, "Ezreal".
OMG lol I love Ez , wish he was a bit stronger =P
Have you ever tried ap ez, If you get ahead a bit, you can easily 100-0 squisies quite fun

Not a fan of AP Ez haha, if you're ahead a bit as any mid assassin you can 100-0 other carrier. =P
If you put Ez in a burst role, you lose the satisfaction of prolonged duels where you get multiple uses of q and e to make big plays!
It amazes me how Rioters actually play their own game and know extensive knowledge of it. That's very good to see. Unlike every other triple AAA developers...

I play based on how uncommon that champ is to see in battle.
For example {{champion:111}}, {{champion:101}}, {{champion:68}} and {{champion:121}} are champions you rarely see anyone playing and those are generally the champs i'm good at. I like to try and popularize champs by playing them to by best extent.

kaz is almost in every 4-5 games i play but the other 3 i haven't seen for a long time, i main shyvana jungle as my favorite and support kayle  as my second. i never see them in any games at all but im expecting to see more shyvana's more now with her jungle buff
Yeah, Well i do see Kha but not often enough. I do however see Shyvana ALOT in the "Watch Now" section so i excluded her.

I love to play the odd picks, for example my fav is top support Sejuani, i suck at jungle so anything i can jungle i eventually learn to top with (however i always keep Teleport in case someone needs a gank :) ), then i really get into mid Karma, i almost NEVER see her anymore and its sad because she plays really well :)
super glad to see other people have quirky champion preferences too haha, thanks for the reply ladies n gents!

For me it's purely who I find the most fun at the time. I have played just about every role avidly with just one champion at one point or another. 
Gnar being my current favourite :)

I play champs almost exclusively on looks, for example champs with good models and splash arts like Azir and yasuo i play often, and champs like evelynn and vayne i dont. (vayne's colours are all over the place, and well... just look at evelynn)

so unless i have a skin for a %%%%ty visual champ i won't play them for example i wouldn't play Cho'gath unless i had a skin like Jurassic or battlecast for him
I also don't like playing super powerful champs like Yi or Kat or Lee (and i admit that recently my yasuo playing has declined because of this)

But Azir is my fave, he looks great, is super fun to play, you dont feel like a %%%% when you play him (unlike Yi/Kat ect.) he has awesome lore and is voiced by one of my fave voice actors who also voices my fave anime character :)

I do it based on the personality in their appearance - the story their "look" describes. Then I'll either stick with them or move on depending on how fun/challenging/rewarding their gameplay is. Lore is the LAST thing on my checklist.
Use to go Hecarim for the looks but now I go for whose fun
no, because riot changes lore too often.
